alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:43PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Phillips and west central Valley Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 343 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Zortman, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fourchette, Phillips, Content and Sun Prairie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for northeastern Montana.
